welcome_message_body: Welcome to Irving, a charming city known for its vibrant arts scene and diverse cultural attractions. We invite you to explore our beautiful parks, delicious dining options, and unique shopping experiences. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories in our wonderful city!
